block_comment: This block implements a synchronous reset and update operation for the 'D_valid' signal. Upon a negative edge of 'reset_n', 'D_valid' resets to 0. In all other cases, 'D_valid' updates at the positive edge of the clock('clk') to the logical OR result of 'F_valid' and 'W1_rf_ecc_recoverable_valid'.
